tasks.label: install requirements
tasks.command: cmd /c if not exist .\env\Scripts\activate (python -m venv env && .\env\Scripts\activate) else .\env\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt

tasks.label: Run server
tasks.command: cmd /c if exist .\env\Scripts\activate ( .\env\Scripts\activate && python manage.py runserver )

tasks.label: migrations
tasks.command: cmd /c if exist .\env\Scripts\activate ( .\env\Scripts\activate && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate )
